name: International Journal of Biomedical Engineering and Science
content: International Journal of Biomedical Engineering and Science (IJBES) ISSN:2394-0832 https://airccse.com/ijbes/index.html Scope: International Journal of Biomedical Engineering and Science (IJBES) is a peer-reviewed, open access which focuses on the latest advances, applications and future trends in the area of Biomedical Engineering. The journal documents practical and theoretical results which make a fundamental contribution for the development of Biomedical Engineering and science. Topics of interest: • Artificial Intelligence in Biomedical Sciences • Bioinformatics of Diseases • Bioinstrumentation • Biomaterials • Biomechanics of injury and wound healing • Biomechatronics • Biomedical Electronics • Biomedical Intelligence & Clinical Data Analysis • Bionanotechnology • Bionics • Biophysics • Biosensor technology • Cellular, Tissue and Genetic Engineering • Computational Systems Biology • Immunology • Injury Prevention and Health Protection • Medical Engineering Systems & Applications • Medical Robotics • Neural Engineering • Orthopedic Bioengineering • Regenerative medicine and Tissue Engineering • Rehabilitation engineering • Social and preventive medicine • Sport and exercise medicine • Systems Physiology • Toxicology • Clinical Biochemistry Paper submission Authors are invited to submit papers for this journal through Submission System . Submissions must be original and should not have been published previously or be under consideration for publication while being evaluated for this Journal. For paper format download the template in this page. Important dates: • Submission Deadline : Nov 12, 2022 • Notification : Dec 12, 2022 • Final Manuscript Due : Dec 20, 2022 • Publication Date : Determined by the Editor-in-Chief Contact us: Here's where you can reach us : ijbesjournal@yahoo.com or ijbesjournal@airccse.com
